sudo apt-get -y install ipython ipython-notebook
#sudo yum -y install ipython ipython-notebook
pip3 install jupyter
jupyter notebook
jupyter notebook --ip=abc.de.fg.ijk --port=1234 --allow-root
jupyter notebook --ip=0.0.0.0 --port=1234 --allow-root
#Copy paste link generated by running the above command


%matplotlib inline
%autoindent

# find out password 
cat nohup.out | grep "token"

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

#Enable zooming of plots in IPython Notebooks / Jupyter Notebooks
#pip3 install mpld3
import mpld3
mpld3.enable_notebook() #To enable
mpld3.disable_notebook() #To disable


#shortcuts - https://www.cheatography.com/weidadeyue/cheat-sheets/jupyter-notebook/pdf_bw/

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.style.use(['dark_background', 'ggplot'])
get_ipython().magic(u'matplotlib inline')
from IPython.display import clear_output
# Ignore warnings
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

#Add image to ipython/jupyter notebook
#First change comiler from Python to Markdown write the following line
![title](image_name.png)


#To use pyspark from jupyter in AWS
pip uninstall pyspark
vi ~/.bashrc

PYSPARK_DRIVER_PYTHON=jupyter
PYSPARK_DRIVER_PYTHON_OPTS='notebook --allow-root --ip=0.0.0.0'

source ~/.bashrc

#To launch jupyter notebook with psyaprk
pyspark
